The National Assembly () is the lower house of the bicameral Parliament of the Republic of the Congo. It has 151 members, elected for five-year terms in single-seat constituencies.
Colonial elections
*1946–47
*1952
*1957

*1959
*1963
*1973
*1979
*1984
*1989
*1992
*1993
*2002
*2007
*2012
*2017
*2022
